item.title: prediction of probability to fail
item.description: Prediction in Cox regression with stackexchange How can I obtain prediction intervals for survival prediction in the Cox model? with stackexchange detailed pdf of General theory and r code for cox model Calculating survival probability per person at time (t) from Cox PH with stats.stackexchange How to use r to compute confidence interval for a given age with predictCox package
